content:
As an Amazon Rewards Visa cardholder, you can earn points on purchases made not only on Amazon, but also at other merchants, both online and in-store.

**Earning Points at Amazon:**

* You'll earn 3% back at Amazon.com, including Amazon Fresh, Amazon Prime Now, and Amazon Restaurants.
* You'll earn 2% back at Amazon Go, Amazon 4-star, Amazon Bookstore, and Amazon Pop Up locations.

**Earning Points at Other Merchants:**

* You'll earn 1% back on all other purchases made with your Amazon Rewards Visa card, including:
	+ Online purchases at other websites
	+ In-store purchases at retailers, restaurants, and other merchants
	+ Travel bookings, gas stations, and more

**No Rotating Categories or Spending Limits:**

Unlike some other rewards credit cards, the Amazon Rewards Visa card doesn't have rotating categories or spending limits on earning points. You'll earn points on all eligible purchases, with no limits or restrictions.

**Points Earning Structure:**

To recap, here's the points earning structure for your Amazon Rewards Visa card:

* 3% back at Amazon.com and other Amazon services
* 2% back at Amazon physical stores
* 1% back on all other purchases

Remember, you can redeem your points for statement credits, Amazon gift cards, or other rewards, as we discussed earlier.

I hope that helps clarify things! Let me know if you have any more questions.
